videos.description: Tre'Davious White explains what it's like to have his team make the playoffs for the second time in three years and to have his alma mater, LSU, ranked No. 1 in college football.
videos.headline: Bills' White: This is the happiest time of my life right now

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Interview (Bills’ White: This is the happiest time of my life right now) 2019/12/15 SVP
